comment:
* Base class for classes that implement {@link UrlRequest} including experimental
 * features. {@link CronetUrlRequest} and {@link JavaUrlRequest} extends this class.

methods.name: protected abstract void setHttpMethod(String method)
methods.comment:
* Sets the HTTP method verb to use for this request. Must be done before * request has started. * *

The default when this method is not called is "GET" if the request has * no body or "POST" if it does. * * @param method "GET", "HEAD", "DELETE", "POST" or "PUT".

methods.name: protected abstract void addHeader(String header, String value)
methods.comment:
* Adds a request header. Must be done before request has started.
     *
     * @param header header name.
     * @param value header value.

methods.name: protected abstract void setUploadDataProvider(UploadDataProvider uploadDataProvider, Executor executor)
methods.comment:
* Sets upload data provider. Must be done before request has started. May only be
     * invoked once per request. Switches method to "POST" if not explicitly
     * set. Starting the request will throw an exception if a Content-Type
     * header is not set.
     *
     * @param uploadDataProvider responsible for providing the upload data.
     * @param executor All {@code uploadDataProvider} methods will be invoked
     *     using this {@code Executor}. May optionally be the same
     *     {@code Executor} the request itself is using.

methods.name: public static int convertLoadState(int loadState)
methods.comment:
* Convert a LoadState int to one of values listed above.
     * @param loadState a LoadState to convert.
     * @return static int Status.

methodNames: protected abstract void addHeader(String header, String value)
protected abstract void setUploadDataProvider(UploadDataProvider uploadDataProvider, Executor executor)
